titleStmt.title: An answere vnto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge made by Vvillyam Tindale. First he declareth what the church is, and geveth a reason of certayne wordes which Master More rebuketh in the tra[n]slacion of the newe Testament. After that he answereth particularlye vnto everye chaptre which semeth to haue anye apperaunce of truth thorow all his .iiij. bokes
Answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge.
titleStmt.author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

titleStmt.title: An answere vnto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge made by Vvillyam Tindale. First he declareth what the church is, and geveth a reason of certayne wordes which Master More rebuketh in the tra[n]slacion of the newe Testament. After that he answereth particularlye vnto everye chaptre which semeth to haue anye apperaunce of truth thorow all his .iiij. bokes
Answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge.
titleStmt.author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

notesStmt.note: Answers: More, Thomas. A dyaloge of dyvers maters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
